data.message: I just have to say, this is awesome! I'm just scanning down this post, and it's truly amazing to see Facebook responding to all of the concerned users! You guys are so freaking fabulous for doing this! It really shows how much you care about the people's concerns, and how you want to make people feel comfortable by using your resources. Thank you, for taking that time out, and wish you all nothing but continued success, on the best social networking platform out here today!

replies.message: Thanks so much for sharing with us, Tobyus! We'll be sure to let our team know to keep up the good work. :) -Abby
